Description:
Job Title                   : Social Media Specialist.Job Role                  : Implement Social Media Strategy. Location                   : Kuwait      Career level             : Mid-Career/Professional   Position Type           : Full-timeJob Summary :Social Media Marketing: Proficiency in creating, implementing, and managing social media marketing strategies across various platforms.
Content Creation: Ability to develop engaging and relevant content, including graphics, videos, and written posts, tailored to the target audience, working with various creative agencies for building monthly content
Analytics and Metrics: Skill in analyzing social media data and using insights to optimize performance and make data-driven decisions.
Community Management: Managing and engaging with followers, responding to comments and messages, and fostering a positive online community, reporting any unusual sentiment captured on the platforms
Platform Knowledge: Familiarity with different social media platforms and their unique features to maximize reach and impact.
Trend Awareness: Staying up to date with the latest social media trends, algorithms, and best practices.
Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills to effectively convey messages and maintain a brand's voice.
Customer Service: Addressing customer inquiries and concerns promptly and professionally.
Brand Management: Ensuring social media content aligns with the brand's image and values.
Collaboration: Ability to work with cross-functional teams, such as marketing, design, and customer support, to achieve common goals.Skills
Skills:
Creative marketing skills & ability to think out of the box. 
In-depth knowledge & understanding with different social media platforms. 
Ability to effectively communicate, information in Arabic & English.
Team player with the confidence to take the lead & guide department when necessary.
Should have a good technical understanding & ability to pick up new tools quickly.
Have good knowledge of principles of SEO & CMS (Search engine optimization - Content management system).
Public relations, Marketing, Customer service experience would be a plus.

Relevant Experience (in years)  : 3-4 years
Education: bachelor’s degree - Marketing/master’s degree preferred.
Specialized Experience:  social media/blogging in FMCG/commercial/Retail environment.
IT: Social media certifications/Content Management
Preferred Language : Arabic & English
